item.title: New paper: eplusr: A framework for integrating building energy simulation and data-driven analytics
item.description: We have a new paper: Hongyuan Jia, Adrian Chong (2020). eplusr: A framework for integrating building energy simulation and data-driven analytics. Energy and Buildings. :10.13140/RG.2.2.34326.16966⁄1 Building energy simulation (BES) has been widely adopted for the investigation of building environmental and energy performance for different design and retrofit alternatives. Data-driven analytics is vital for interpreting and analyzing BES results to reveal trends and provide useful insights.
